group_1.narration: After reuniting with Iroha, we headed to the@Magius' headquarters with Kuroe as our guide.
But what awaited us there was something@we never imagined.
A mistake caused by my own inadequacy, confronting me now@after I finally became honest about my love for my friends.
In the end, I've been running away from my friends@for a long time, turning a blind eye...
